original_text: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord, my soul shall be joyful in my God; for he hath clothed me with the garments of salvation, he hath covered me with the robe of righteousness, as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments, and as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels.
korean_text: 내가 여호와로 말미암아 크게 기뻐하며 내 영혼이 나의 하나님으로 말미암아 즐거워하리니 이는 그가 구원의 옷을 내게 입히시며 공의의 겉옷을 내게 더하심이 신랑이 사모를 쓰며 신부가 자기 보석으로 단장함 같게 하셨음이라

sentences.original_text: I will greatly rejoice in the Lord
my soul shall be joyful in my God
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 영은 나의 하나님 안에서 즐거워하리라

sentences.original_text: for he hath clothed me with garments of salvation
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 그가 나를 구원의 옷으로 입히셨음이라

sentences.original_text: he hath covered me with robe of righteousness
as a bridegroom decketh himself with ornaments
as a bride adorneth herself with her jewels
